title: Factors To Be Considered When Signing Up For New Car Insurance in UAE (Crazzy Paul)
text: By Crazzy Paul Oct 23, 2015 It is compulsory for all UAE car owners to have car insurance. But there are several value added services and crucial factors to be considered when signing up for a insurance policy. If you have bought a new car, most of the dealers offer you free insurance for a year. But when you renew it, check out whether there are cheaper alternatives. Platinum Insurance Broker UAE offers best Online Motor Insurance in Dubai, Online Auto Insurance in Dubai and Third Party Insurance in UAE through their skilled team of technical expertise and innovation. The team supports to increase the protection and reduce the costs for insuring the vehicles.The factors to be considered when you sign up for UAE Car Insurance are as follows:1. The third party newer car owners require comprehensive policies that cover all eventualities. The old vehicle owners can take third party policy that mainly covers fire and theft.2. If the brand and the car are more expensive, then the insurance premium will also be high. So drivers have to estimate and include their annual insurance costs with the purchase price of the car.3. Your age: The age plays a major role in determining the insurance premium. Drivers who are below the age of thirty can expect higher premiums as most of the people in that age will be having driving experience less than one year.4. Oman and GCC coverage: The place you want to drive also influence the rate of insurance premium for your car. Some policies automatically covers Oman but others expect to pay extra for Oman trip.5. Off road coverage: The drivers who take shortcuts while driving in the city across the wastelands would be advisable to take off road insurance in case of breakdown or accident.6. Breakdown coverage: You may need to pay more for this breakdown coverage but it is worth as nobody wants to get stuck on the roadside at 3am and look for a garage.7. No-claims discount: If you are having an excellent driving record then you can find a vehicle insurer who can reward you with low premium. Other discounts are such as family / spousal discount is you are insuring more than one car from your family to that same insurer.8. Time savers: People who are with busy work schedules can include a replacement car in your policy if you mat with an accident. Some insurers can also register your car free of charge. When you are buying the car insurance consider:The reason for the insurance coverageThe benefits you want to include in the insurance cover such as additional driver, property damage, employment loss, accident risk and many more.The amount you would like to pay for the insurance premium because the higher the coverage the greater is the insurance premium payable.The number of people covered in the policy.The reputation of your car insurerWhile choosing the right insurer, check the following matters such as:Reputation of the insurer, their claim history and level of customer serviceInsurer's activities in the social media and their prompt response to the customers' queries.Performance of the insurer by asking your friends and family members and their customer service to take well informed decision.
